Reviews.Content: Eveythink was OK, I buy this pruduc before, ZMODO have very good product. The only probleme I see with the product is the camera,the angle of vision its limited. I like to have dome camera but I can't not change the model of camera.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 channel security dvr
View Online or From Smartphone:AndroidTM 2.1 - 2.3, iPhone®, iPad®, SymbianTM V3 & V5, Windows Mobile® 5.1 & 6.1, or BlackBerry® 7.
Day & Night Monitoring: Full, true-to-life color picture during the day and black & white infrared-aided picture at night. Cameras can capture images in night vision mode up at 65' away.
Instant Email Alerts if Activity Detected: This system is designed to send an email alert, complete with photo of the activity, if any motion is detected, or if any camera experiences video loss.
1TB HDD Allows for 2 Weeks of Recording
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo 8 Channel CCTV Surveillance H.264 Real time DVR Outdoor 8 Security Camera System - 3G Mobile 1TB HD
